page.title: 01EASTRIGGS OUTLINE
page.content: This block lies within: Dumfries & Galloway Region; Annandale & Eskdale District; the former county of Dumfries_shire; and the parishes of Dornock and Gretna. The block comprises fairly level grass_land, bounded to the South by the Solway Firth. The only community, apart from farms, is Eastriggs (pop. 1765), lying about 60ft. above sea level. There are various employers in the village (Ordnance depot, lemonade factory, peat works, boiler repairers, light engineering, dairy, garage, shops and various small businesses). The main route through the block is the East_West A75 Gretna_Sranraer trunk road. Nearest town Annan (pop.8290). Nearest city Carlisle (pop. 70,706).
